EmailTemplate.description: Message to be selected as auto-reply when SIN hub is disrupted
EmailTemplate.name: BCP Message - SIN Hub disruption
EmailTemplate.subject: Unexpected incident
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for contacting IATA.
Due to unforeseen circumstances, our IATA Singapore office is currently unavailable for an undetermined period of time.
We are working to re-establish our services and we will reply to your request at the earliest convenience.
We would like to apologize for the inconvenience and the delay in our response.
IATA Customer Service Team
